latestUpdates.title: Peacemaker Season 1
latestUpdates.description: The continuing story of Peacemaker – a compellingly vainglorious man who believes in peace at any cost, no matter how many people he has to kill to get it – in the aftermath of the events of “The Suicide Squad.”

Determined to uncover the truth, she teams up with police captain Lu Ye, whose dreams begin revealing key clues. As they follow these leads, their fates become deeply intertwined.

latestUpdates.title: Whale Store xoxo
latestUpdates.description: After inheriting her father's struggling store, Wan bonds with a charming regular who offers to help, but her new friend's family have other ideas.

latestUpdates.title: Moonlit Reunion
latestUpdates.description: Mei Zhuyu, a calm and reserved nobleman from a lesser branch of the Mei family, arrives in Chang'an as an official at the Bureau of Mystic Investigations. During a banquet, he meets Wu Zhen, the bold and unruly younger sister of the Empress and secret Guardian of the Demon Underworld. Both hide their true identities. Wu, a half-demon striving to keep peace, and Mei, a skilled demon slayer, seek the truth behind the fire 18 years ago. As bone demons rise and unrest grows, they fight side by side, forming a bond that deepens into love until the Changxi Palace launches a purge, forcing them to face each other's secrets and the past they share.

latestUpdates.title: A Forbidden Marriage
latestUpdates.description: Yang Wangyue, the reborn saint of the Holy Fire Sect, is given a second chance at life and pursues her long-held wish to be with Yang Qing, an elder of a righteous sect. Together, they attempt to uncover the true mastermind behind the chaos and strive to reconcile the warring sects, to bring peace to the martial world.

latestUpdates.title: When Destiny Brings The Demon
latestUpdates.description: Modern-day office drone Zou Yan accidentally stumbles into the world of cultivation and wakes up as Liao Tingyan, a disciple of the Qinggutian Sect. She's soon selected to serve the reclusive Grandmaster Sima Jiao, a powerful cultivator who's been secretly sealed inside a mountain for 500 years. Twisted by isolation and rage, he's cold, hot-tempered, and bent on revenge. Liao Tingyan doesn't know that "her" original identity is a demonic assassin. But to his surprise, she shows no ill will, no ambition, and no desire at all. Her nature fascinates him. Thus begins an unlikely romance between a villainous immortal and a healing-type "slacker," a connection that defies fate and spans lifetimes.

latestUpdates.title: My Girlfriend Is the Man!
latestUpdates.description: A university student falls for his first blind date, but when she mysteriously wakes up as a man, they decide to stay together and wait for her to return to her true form, testing the limits of their love.

Wen Xiao, suspicious of Zhao Yuanzhou, joins the bureau along with her childhood friend Zhuo Yichen, skilled archer Pei Sijing, and the talented but timid doctor Bai Jiu. Together, they confront the creatures from "The Classic of Mountains and Seas" and uncover the darker truths behind the chaos.

The series weaves together two dramatic stories – «Hot Blooded» (30 episodes) and «Duel on Mount Hua» (30 episodes), the latter encompassing four character arcs: «Nine Yin True Sutra» (8 episodes), «Eastern Heretic and Western Venom» (8 episodes), «Southern Emperor and Northern Beggar» (8 episodes), and «Five Great Masters» (6 episodes).
